abatement-date.Name: abatement-date
abatement-date.Description: The date the infection was resolved.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
Always "infection" for this API.

Starting in August 2021, multiple category values are allowed if the requestor is authorized to search multiple Condition categories.

clinical-status.Name: clinical-status
clinical-status.Description: Status of the infection. Infections can have a status of “active” or “inactive.” If no status is specified, all infections are returned.

code.Name: code
code.Description: SNOMED code associated with the infection.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: Reference to an Encounter resource associated with an infection. If no encounter is specified, all patient- and encounter-level infections are returned.
encounter.Optional: Either patient, subject, or encounter must be specified.

onset-date.Name: onset-date
onset-date.Description: The date the patient acquired the infection.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to a patient resource the infection is for.
patient.Optional: Either patient, subject, or encounter must be specified.

recorded-date.Name: recorded-date
recorded-date.Description: The date the infection was added to the patient’s chart.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Reference to a patient resource the infection is for.
subject.Optional: Either patient, subject, or encounter must be specified.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

Condition.Name: Condition
Condition.Description: An instance of the R4 Condition resource.

abatementDateTime.Name: abatementDateTime
abatementDateTime.Description: The date and time the infection was resolved.

code.Name: code
code.Description: The display name for the infection and the SNOMED code if one exists.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: The encounter associated with the infection. Only applies to encounter-level infections.

onsetDateTime.Name: onsetDateTime
onsetDateTime.Description: The date the patient acquired the infection

recordedDate.Name: recordedDate
recordedDate.Description: The date and time the infection was added to the patient’s chart

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient associated with the infection.
